title: Bug 5128JavaUI.revealInEditor doesn't handle ICompilationUnits properly
description: Bug 5128JavaUI.revealInEditor doesn't handle ICompilationUnits properly This isn't useful, passing an ICompilationUnit shouldbe treated as a noop. Otherwise clients need to guard against revealing thepackage declaration in their code (see OpenResourceAction as an example)
SR: When calling JavaUI.revealInEditor with an ICompilationUnit, then the packagedeclaration is revealed.
